content: pattern is now available a traditional christmas stocking to hang on your mantle piece or the foot of your bed to be filled with presents or just as a festive decoration as a non-wearable item this can be made in a variety of yarns and guages to suit your needs the charts are pretty basic as i have yet to buy decent software but with a ruler or sticky note to mark your row you should have no problems as always this is untested apart from the sample i made myself but it s really the most basic of sock constructions any problems just send me a message 29 october 2011 - small amendment to one of the charts hope all is ok now 3 october 2012 - charts are now drawn with an overlaid grid to make them easier to read
